Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that Trey Gowdy's investigators were found tortured and killed, when there is no evidence to support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or credible reports to back up the claim of investigators being tortured and killed.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no evidence of any such incident happening in Little Rock, Arkansas, where the Clinton Presidential Library is located.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Trey Gowdy had no comment about the incident for safety reasons, without any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim could have alternative explanations, such as being part of an internet hoax or fabricated story, as flagged by Facebook users.
